results.description: COVID Mortality Tracker allows DCEG investigators to monitor weekly U.S. trends in overall and cause-specific mortality since the onset of the COVID-19 pandemic. The tools uses data visualization techniques to reveal patterns and generate potential research questions.

results.description: Novel isoform of ACE2 (the cell receptor used by the SARS-CoV-2 virus to infect the body) identified. The new report suggests that production of ACE2 is not affected by the presence of interferons, contributed by treatment or various viral infections, including SARS-CoV-2.
results.title: Novel Isoform of ACE2 Resolves Concern about Interferon-based Treatments for COVID-19 - National Cancer Institute
